name: date_understanding_239
task:
Write the answer to the following question to a file called answer.txt: Yesterday was 12/31/1929. Today could not be 12/32/1929 because December has only 31 days. What is the date one week ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/25/1929
(B) 09/20/1929
(C) 12/16/1929
(D) 12/28/1929
(E) 01/22/1930
(F) 12/25/2006

info.description: Given a small set of sentences about a particular date, answer the provided question.
